name: Gold Mountain
description:
Mine the minerals and gems in the mountain for making money!
You can earn money faster and faster by buying items and upgrading your level!

- Instruction -
Move: Touch the desired position.
Mining: Touch the desired mineral.
Upgrade: Touch the desired upgrade button.

- Upgrade -
Speed: Mining speed.
Power: Mining power.
Skill: Amount of money from mining.

- Reincarnation (Get soul money!) -
You can reincanation in Temple of Reincarnation.
If you are reincarnated, you will lose your money, level, and some items, but Soul Money and special items will stay in your inventory.
